channel.title: How to I make my client compatible with Allstar?
channel.description:
How do I make a 317, 377 or 459 client compatible with allstar?
Thanks.

item.title: How to I make my client compatible with Allstar?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I haven’t really seen what Allstar is like so I can’t point you anywhere specific but lets say your using a 474 client, I’d recommend you find a 474 source that already works for it so you can rip the packet information and then rework most of the login yourself for Allstar to match. Don’t forget to bare networking. Common files effected may be called RS2LoginDecoder, Player, Client, Socket, PacketHandlers (these class’s may be different in your case) etc.

Read full topic
item.source: How to I make my client compatible with Allstar?

item.title: How to I make my client compatible with Allstar?
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Flame_:

A better question that would prevent this topic from getting locked (as right now this is a request) would be “How do I make my client compatible with an Allstar-based source?”

Thanks, updated my thread.
